question: What is the description of the film ACADEMY DINOSAUR?

question: How many films have a rental duration of over 6 days?

question: Which film has the longest duration of film screening? Please give its title.

question: Which film has a higher replacement cost, ACE GOLDFINGER or ACADEMY DINOSAUR?

question: How many films with the rental rate of $2.99 have the special feature of "Deleted Scenes"?

question: Please list the titles of all the films that have more than 2 special features.
query: SELECT title FROM ( SELECT title, COUNT(special_features) AS num FROM film GROUP BY title ) AS T ORDER BY T.num > 2

question: Please give the full names of all the active staff.

question: In which year was the film with the highest replacement cost released?

question: Please list the titles of the top 3 films with the highest replacement cost.
query: SELECT title FROM film WHERE replacement_cost = ( SELECT MAX(replacement_cost) FROM film ) LIMIT 3

question: What is the language of the film ACADEMY DINOSAUR?

question: How many films are in English?

question: Among the films that the customer RUTH MARTINEZ has rented, what is the title of the one with the highest replacement cost?

question: Please list the full names of all the customers who have rented the film with the highest replacement cost.

question: How many films rented to the customer RUTH MARTINEZ were returned in August, 2005?
query: SELECT COUNT(T1.customer_id) FROM customer AS T1 INNER JOIN rental AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id WHERE T1.first_name = 'RUTH' AND T1.last_name = 'MARTINEZ' AND STRFTIME('%m',T2.return_date) = '8' AND STRFTIME('%Y', T2.return_date) = '2005'

question: Please give the full name of the customer that have rented the most films.
query: SELECT T.first_name, T.last_name FROM ( SELECT T1.first_name, T1.last_name, COUNT(T2.rental_id) AS num FROM customer AS T1 INNER JOIN rental AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id GROUP BY T1.first_name, T1.last_name ) AS T ORDER BY T.num DESC LIMIT 1

question: Among the customers who have rented the film ACADEMY DINOSAUR, how many of them are active?

question: Which film is rented for the most times by the customers? Please give its title.
query: SELECT T.title FROM ( SELECT T1.title, COUNT(T3.rental_id) AS num FROM film AS T1 INNER JOIN inventory AS T2 ON T1.film_id = T2.film_id INNER JOIN rental AS T3 ON T2.inventory_id = T3.inventory_id GROUP BY T1.title ) AS T ORDER BY T.num DESC LIMIT 1

question: Which customer has rented more movies, RUTH MARTINEZ or LINDA WILLIAMS?
query: SELECT T.first_name, T.last_name FROM ( SELECT T1.first_name, T1.last_name, COUNT(T1.customer_id) AS num FROM customer AS T1 INNER JOIN rental AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id WHERE (T1.first_name = 'RUTH' AND T1.last_name = 'MARTINEZ') OR (T1.first_name = 'LINDA' AND T1.last_name = 'WILLIAMS') GROUP BY T1.first_name, T1.last_name ) AS T ORDER BY T.num DESC LIMIT 1

question: Among all the films starring PENELOPE GUINESS, what is the title of the one with the highest rental price per day?

question: What is the average replacement cost of the films under the category of "Horror"?

question: Among all films that the customer RUTH MARTINEZ has rented, what is the percentage of it being a Music film?
query: SELECT CAST(SUM(IIF(T3.name = 'Music', 1, 0)) AS REAL) * 100 / COUNT(T1.film_id) FROM film AS T1 INNER JOIN film_category AS T2 ON T1.film_id = T2.film_id INNER JOIN category AS T3 ON T2.category_id = T3.category_id INNER JOIN inventory AS T4 ON T1.film_id = T4.film_id INNER JOIN customer AS T5 ON T4.store_id = T5.store_id INNER JOIN rental AS T6 ON T4.inventory_id = T6.inventory_id WHERE T5.first_name = 'RUTH' AND T5.last_name = 'MARTINEZ'

question: State the name of the category which has the most number of films.

question: What is the percentage more for the rental payment for store No.2 than store No.1?
query: SELECT CAST((SUM(IIF(T2.store_id = 2, T1.amount, 0)) - SUM(IIF(T2.store_id = 1, T1.amount, 0))) AS REAL) * 100 / SUM(IIF(T2.store_id = 1, T1.amount, 0)) FROM payment AS T1 INNER JOIN customer AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id INNER JOIN store AS T3 ON T2.store_id = T3.store_id

question: How many times is the number of Indian cities than Italian cities?

question: How many times is the number of films Gina DeGeneres acted in than Penelope Guinness?

question: What is the full name of the customer who rented movies for 7 consecutive days?
query: SELECT T1.first_name, T1.last_name FROM customer AS T1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS num_days FROM ( SELECT *, date(days, '-' || rn || ' day') AS results FROM ( SELECT customer_id, days, row_number() OVER (PARTITION BY customer_id ORDER BY days) AS rn FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT customer_id, date(rental_date) AS days FROM rental ) ) ) GROUP BY customer_id, results HAVING num_days = 7 ) AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id

question: What is the full name of the actor who has the highest number of restricted films?

question: Who are the top 5 actors with the highest number of films? List their full names and calculate the average number of films for each of the actors.
query: SELECT T.first_name, T.last_name, num FROM ( SELECT T1.first_name, T1.last_name, COUNT(T2.film_id) AS num FROM actor AS T1 INNER JOIN film_actor AS T2 ON T1.actor_id = T2.actor_id INNER JOIN film AS T3 ON T2.film_id = T3.film_id GROUP BY T1.first_name, T1.last_name ) AS T ORDER BY T.num DESC LIMIT 5

question: List the actors' IDs who have "KILMER" as last name.

question: List down the films titles with the lowest replacement cost under the general audiences rating.

question: Among the films with the longest duration, list any five title with their descriptions and special features.

question: Mention the language of Untouchables Sunrise film and calculate its rental cost per day.

question: List the films' titles which were rented on 24th May,2005.

question: List the films' titles which were rented by Brian Wyman in July, 2005.

question: Write down the inventories' IDs and actors' names of "STREETCAR INTENTIONS".

question: Among the films rented by Natalie Meyer, describe the titles and categories of the films which were rented in February 2006.
query: SELECT T3.title, T2.name FROM film_category AS T1 INNER JOIN category AS T2 ON T1.category_id = T2.category_id INNER JOIN film AS T3 ON T1.film_id = T3.film_id INNER JOIN inventory AS T4 ON T3.film_id = T4.film_id INNER JOIN customer AS T5 ON T4.store_id = T5.store_id INNER JOIN rental AS T6 ON T4.inventory_id = T6.inventory_id WHERE T5.first_name = 'Natalie' AND T5.last_name = 'Meyer' AND STRFTIME('%Y',T3.rental_rate) = '2006' AND STRFTIME('%m',T3.rental_rate) = '2'

question: How many rental IDs belong to Eleanor Hunt?

question: Describe the full names and cities of the customers who rented "DREAM PICKUP".
query: SELECT T4.first_name, T4.last_name, T6.city FROM film AS T1 INNER JOIN inventory AS T2 ON T1.film_id = T2.film_id INNER JOIN rental AS T3 ON T2.inventory_id = T3.inventory_id INNER JOIN customer AS T4 ON T3.customer_id = T4.customer_id INNER JOIN address AS T5 ON T4.address_id = T5.address_id INNER JOIN city AS T6 ON T5.city_id = T6.city_id WHERE T1.title = 'DREAM PICKUP'

question: Calculate how many percent of customers were located in India.
query: SELECT CAST(SUM(IIF(T1.country = 'India', 1, 0)) AS REAL) * 100 / COUNT(T4.customer_id) FROM country AS T1 INNER JOIN city AS T2 ON T1.country_id = T2.country_id INNER JOIN address AS T3 ON T2.city_id = T3.city_id INNER JOIN customer AS T4 ON T3.address_id = T4.address_id

question: How much percentage of the film did Mary Keitel perform more than Angela Witherspoon?

question: Provide the email, address, city, and country of the customer Lillie Kim.

question: In films with rental rate of 4.99, list down the inventory ID of the films starred by Lucille Dee.

question: List the store ID of the films with a rental rate greater than the 60% of average rental rate of all listed films.

question: Among the films starred by Nick Wahlberg, what is the percentage of the films with G rating?

question: List the address in Texas in the ascending order of city id.

question: Find the full name and email address of inactive customers whose record was created in 2006.
query: SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer WHERE STRFTIME('%Y',create_date) = '2006' AND active = 0

question: What percentage of the movies are PG-13?

question: Calculate the average rent amount paid by the customer with customer id 15.
query: SELECT AVG(amount) FROM payment WHERE customer_id = 15

question: How many customers rented for an above-average period?

question: Among the movies, what percentage are horror?

question: Give the full name of the actor who acted in the most number of movies?
query: SELECT T.first_name, T.last_name FROM ( SELECT T2.first_name, T2.last_name, COUNT(T1.film_id) AS num FROM film_actor AS T1 INNER JOIN actor AS T2 ON T1.actor_id = T2.actor_id GROUP BY T2.first_name, T2.last_name ) AS T ORDER BY T.num DESC LIMIT 1

question: Give the full name of the actor who acted the most in drama movies?

question: What is the difference in the average number of films rented each day in Australia and Canada?
query: SELECT AVG(IIF(T4.country = 'Australia', 1, 0)) - AVG(IIF(T4.country = 'Canada', 1, 0)) AS diff FROM customer AS T1 INNER JOIN address AS T2 ON T1.address_id = T2.address_id INNER JOIN city AS T3 ON T2.city_id = T3.city_id INNER JOIN country AS T4 ON T3.country_id = T4.country_id

question: Of the movies in which Reese Kilmer acted, what percentage are action movies?
query: SELECT CAST(SUM(IIF(T4.name = 'Action', 1, 0)) AS REAL) * 100 / COUNT(T1.actor_id) FROM actor AS T1 INNER JOIN film_actor AS T2 ON T1.actor_id = T2.actor_id INNER JOIN film_category AS T3 ON T2.film_id = T3.film_id INNER JOIN category AS T4 ON T3.category_id = T4.category_id WHERE T1.first_name = 'Reese' AND T1.last_name = 'Kilmer'

question: Give the total amount of rent for the movie Clockwork Paradice.

question: Find and list the full name of customers who rented more than five types of movies.
query: SELECT T.first_name, T.last_name FROM ( SELECT T1.first_name, T1.last_name, COUNT(T1.customer_id) AS num FROM customer AS T1 INNER JOIN rental AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id INNER JOIN inventory AS T3 ON T2.inventory_id = T3.inventory_id INNER JOIN film AS T4 ON T3.film_id = T4.film_id INNER JOIN film_category AS T5 ON T4.film_id = T5.film_id GROUP BY T1.first_name, T1.last_name ) AS T WHERE T.num > 5

question: What is the average number of actors acted in comedy movies?
query: SELECT AVG(T1.actor_id) FROM film_actor AS T1 INNER JOIN film_category AS T2 ON T1.film_id = T2.film_id INNER JOIN category AS T3 ON T2.category_id = T3.category_id INNER JOIN actor AS T4 ON T4.actor_id = T1.actor_id WHERE T3.name = 'comedy'

question: In children's movies, which was rented the most?
query: SELECT T.title FROM ( SELECT T4.title, COUNT(T4.title) AS num FROM customer AS T1 INNER JOIN rental AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id INNER JOIN inventory AS T3 ON T2.inventory_id = T3.inventory_id INNER JOIN film AS T4 ON T3.film_id = T4.film_id INNER JOIN film_category AS T5 ON T4.film_id = T5.film_id INNER JOIN category AS T6 ON T5.category_id = T6.category_id WHERE T6.name = 'Children' GROUP BY T4.title ) AS T ORDER BY T.num DESC LIMIT 1

question: Calculate the percentage of customers who paid more than the average rent amount in store 1.
query: SELECT CAST(( SELECT COUNT(T1.customer_id) FROM customer AS T1 INNER JOIN payment AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id WHERE T2.amount > ( SELECT AVG(amount) FROM payment ) ) AS REAL) * 100 / ( SELECT COUNT(customer_id) FROM customer )

question: Find and list the full name of customers who rented more family movies than Sci-Fi movies.
query: SELECT DISTINCT IIF(SUM(IIF(T5.name = 'Family', 1, 0)) - SUM(IIF(T5.name = 'Sci-Fi', 1, 0)) > 0, T1.first_name, 0) FROM customer AS T1 INNER JOIN rental AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id INNER JOIN inventory AS T3 ON T2.inventory_id = T3.inventory_id INNER JOIN film_category AS T4 ON T4.film_id = T3.film_id INNER JOIN category AS T5 ON T4.category_id = T5.category_id GROUP BY T1.customer_id

question: How many customers live in the city of Miyakonojo?
query: SELECT COUNT(T3.customer_id) FROM city AS T1 INNER JOIN address AS T2 ON T1.city_id = T2.city_id INNER JOIN customer AS T3 ON T2.address_id = T3.address_id WHERE T1.city = 'Miyakonojo'

question: How many non-active clients have not returned the rented material?
query: SELECT COUNT(T2.customer_id) FROM rental AS T1 INNER JOIN customer AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id WHERE T2.active = 0

question: What is the title of the animated films that have the shortest length?
query: SELECT T1.title FROM film AS T1 INNER JOIN film_category AS T2 ON T1.film_id = T2.film_id INNER JOIN category AS T3 ON T2.category_id = T3.category_id ORDER BY T1.length LIMIT 1

question: In which country is the store where Hector Poinexter rents equipment located?
query: SELECT T5.country FROM customer AS T1 INNER JOIN store AS T2 ON T1.store_id = T2.store_id INNER JOIN address AS T3 ON T2.address_id = T3.address_id INNER JOIN city AS T4 ON T3.city_id = T4.city_id INNER JOIN country AS T5 ON T4.country_id = T5.country_id WHERE T1.first_name = 'HECTOR' AND T1.last_name = 'POINDEXTER'

question: What is the average rental payment in Horror movies?
query: SELECT AVG(T5.amount) FROM category AS T1 INNER JOIN film_category AS T2 ON T1.category_id = T2.category_id INNER JOIN inventory AS T3 ON T2.film_id = T3.film_id INNER JOIN rental AS T4 ON T3.inventory_id = T4.inventory_id INNER JOIN payment AS T5 ON T4.rental_id = T5.rental_id WHERE T1.name = 'Horror'

question: What is the average amount of rent that Christy Vargas paid?
query: SELECT AVG(T2.amount) FROM customer AS T1 INNER JOIN payment AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id WHERE T1.first_name = 'CHRISTY' AND T1.Last_name = 'VARGAS'

question: What percentage of films with a length of less than 100 belong to the Drama category?
query: SELECT CAST(SUM(IIF(T2.length < 100 AND T3.name = 'Drama', 1, 0)) AS REAL) * 100 / COUNT(T1.film_id) FROM film_category AS T1 INNER JOIN film AS T2 ON T1.film_id = T2.film_id INNER JOIN category AS T3 ON T1.category_id = T3.category_id

question: What are the actors that have the same forename as Johnny? Please include in your answer the full names of these actors.
query: SELECT first_name, last_name FROM actor WHERE first_name = 'Johnny'

question: What are the address numbers that are located in Gansu district?
query: SELECT address_id FROM address WHERE district = 'Gansu'

question: Please list three types of film along with their IDs and the latest update.
query: SELECT DISTINCT name, category_id, last_update FROM category LIMIT 3

question: Please list the full names of any three inactive customers.
query: SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customer WHERE active = 0 LIMIT 3

question: What is the rental price per day for Airplane Sierra?
query: SELECT rental_rate / rental_duration AS result FROM film WHERE title = 'AIRPLANE SIERRA'

question: Where is store number 2 located?
query: SELECT T1.address, T1.address2, T1.district FROM address AS T1 INNER JOIN store AS T2 ON T1.address_id = T2.address_id WHERE T2.store_id = 2

question: Which city does the address 1623 Kingstown Drive belong to?
query: SELECT T1.city FROM city AS T1 INNER JOIN address AS T2 ON T2.city_id = T1.city_id WHERE T2.address = '1623 Kingstown Drive'

question: Please name three cities that belong to Algeria.
query: SELECT T2.city FROM country AS T1 INNER JOIN city AS T2 ON T1.country_id = T2.country_id WHERE T1.country = 'Algeria'

question: What is the category of the film Agent Truman?
query: SELECT T3.name FROM film AS T1 INNER JOIN film_category AS T2 ON T1.film_id = T2.film_id INNER JOIN category AS T3 ON T2.category_id = T3.category_id WHERE T1.title = 'AGENT TRUMAN'

question: Please list the titles of any three action films.
query: SELECT T1.title FROM film AS T1 INNER JOIN film_category AS T2 ON T1.film_id = T2.film_id INNER JOIN category AS T3 ON T2.category_id = T3.category_id WHERE T3.name = 'Action' LIMIT 3

question: What is the difference between the number of children's films and action films?
query: SELECT SUM(IIF(T2.name = 'Children', 1, 0)) - SUM(IIF(T2.name = 'Action', 1, 0)) AS diff FROM film_category AS T1 INNER JOIN category AS T2 ON T1.category_id = T2.category_id

question: Which district does Maria Miller live in?
query: SELECT T2.district FROM customer AS T1 INNER JOIN address AS T2 ON T1.address_id = T2.address_id WHERE T1.first_name = 'Maria' AND T1.last_name = 'Miller'

question: Who is the customer that is active and lives at 1795 Santiago de Compostela Way, Texas?
query: SELECT T1.first_name, T1.last_name FROM customer AS T1 INNER JOIN address AS T2 ON T1.address_id = T2.address_id WHERE T2.address = '1795 Santiago de Compostela Way' AND T1.active = 1

question: How many English films have a duration of over 50 minutes and the cost of replacement are under 10.99?
query: SELECT COUNT(T1.film_id) FROM film AS T1 INNER JOIN language AS T2 ON T1.language_id = T2.language_id WHERE T2.name = 'English' AND T1.length > 50 AND T1.replacement_cost < 10.99

question: Who are the actors that act in the ACADEMY DINOSAUR film?
query: SELECT T1.first_name, T1.last_name FROM actor AS T1 INNER JOIN film_actor AS T2 ON T1.actor_id = T2.actor_id INNER JOIN film AS T3 ON T2.film_id = T3.film_id WHERE T3.title = 'ACADEMY DINOSAUR'

question: Please list any two films that Penelope Guiness acted in.
query: SELECT T3.title FROM actor AS T1 INNER JOIN film_actor AS T2 ON T1.actor_id = T2.actor_id INNER JOIN film AS T3 ON T2.film_id = T3.film_id WHERE T1.first_name = 'Penelope' AND T1.last_name = 'Guiness' LIMIT 2

question: What is the percentage of documentary films?
query: SELECT CAST(SUM(IIF(T2.name = 'Documentary', 1, 0)) AS REAL) * 100 / COUNT(T1.film_id) FROM film_category AS T1 INNER JOIN category AS T2 ON T1.category_id = T2.category_id

question: How many films in English are for adults only?
query: SELECT COUNT(T1.film_id) FROM film AS T1 INNER JOIN language AS T2 ON T1.language_id = T2.language_id WHERE T2.name = 'English' AND T1.rating = 'NC-17'

question: Which film has the longest duration?
query: SELECT title FROM film WHERE length = ( SELECT MAX(length) FROM film )

question: How many of the actors are named "Dan"?
query: SELECT COUNT(actor_id) FROM actor WHERE first_name = 'Dan'

question: What is the most common first name among the customers?
query: SELECT first_name FROM customer GROUP BY first_name ORDER BY COUNT(first_name) DESC LIMIT 1

question: What are the ratings of the film featuring behind the scenes?
query: SELECT rating FROM film WHERE special_features LIKE '%Behind the Scenes%'

question: What is the largest number of films rented per customer?
query: SELECT COUNT(rental_id) FROM rental GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY COUNT(rental_id) DESC LIMIT 1

question: List all the films with the word "Lacklusture" in their description.
query: SELECT title FROM film_text WHERE description LIKE '%Lacklusture%'

question: How many films did a customer named Francis Sikes rent?

question: Who is the manager of the store with the largest collection of films?
query: SELECT T.first_name, T.last_name FROM ( SELECT T3.first_name, T3.last_name, COUNT(T1.film_id) AS num FROM inventory AS T1 INNER JOIN store AS T2 ON T1.store_id = T2.store_id INNER JOIN staff AS T3 ON T2.manager_staff_id = T3.staff_id GROUP BY T3.first_name, T3.last_name ) AS T ORDER BY T.num DESC LIMIT 1

question: What are the addresses of the inactive customers?
query: SELECT T2.address FROM customer AS T1 INNER JOIN address AS T2 ON T1.address_id = T2.address_id WHERE T1.active = 0

question: Which category is the most common?
query: SELECT T.name FROM ( SELECT T2.name, COUNT(T2.name) AS num FROM film_category AS T1 INNER JOIN category AS T2 ON T1.category_id = T2.category_id GROUP BY T2.name ) AS T ORDER BY T.num DESC LIMIT 1

question: Provide the cast for the film "Jason trap".
query: SELECT T1.first_name, T1.last_name FROM actor AS T1 INNER JOIN film_actor AS T2 ON T1.actor_id = T2.actor_id INNER JOIN film AS T3 ON T2.film_id = T3.film_id WHERE T3.title = 'JASON TRAP'

question: Who is the customer with the largest payment for rental films?
query: SELECT T.first_name, T.last_name FROM ( SELECT T1.first_name, T1.last_name, SUM(T2.amount) AS num FROM customer AS T1 INNER JOIN payment AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id GROUP BY T1.first_name, T1.last_name ) AS T ORDER BY T.num DESC LIMIT 1

question: List the top 5 most-rented films.
query: SELECT T.title FROM ( SELECT T3.title, COUNT(T2.inventory_id) AS num FROM rental AS T1 INNER JOIN inventory AS T2 ON T1.inventory_id = T2.inventory_id INNER JOIN film AS T3 ON T2.film_id = T3.film_id GROUP BY T3.title ) AS T ORDER BY T.num DESC LIMIT 5

question: Which country does Sasebo belong to?

question: What are the addresses for the stores?

question: List all the animation titles.

question: What is the city with the most customers?
query: SELECT T.city FROM ( SELECT T1.city, COUNT(T3.customer_id) AS num FROM city AS T1 INNER JOIN address AS T2 ON T2.city_id = T1.city_id INNER JOIN customer AS T3 ON T2.address_id = T3.address_id GROUP BY T1.city ) AS T ORDER BY T.num DESC LIMIT 1

question: Which actor acted in the most films?
query: SELECT T.first_name, T.last_name FROM ( SELECT T2.first_name, T2.last_name, SUM(T1.film_id) AS num FROM film_actor AS T1 INNER JOIN actor AS T2 ON T1.actor_id = T2.actor_id GROUP BY T2.first_name, T2.last_name ) AS T ORDER BY T.num DESC LIMIT 1

query: SELECT title FROM film WHERE length = ( SELECT MIN(length) FROM film ) ORDER BY rental_duration * rental_rate DESC LIMIT 1

question: Calculate the total amount paid by Stephanie Mitchell for film rentals in June 2005.
query: SELECT SUM(T1.amount) FROM payment AS T1 INNER JOIN customer AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id WHERE T2.first_name = 'STEPHANIE' AND T2.last_name = 'MITCHELL' AND SUBSTR(T1.payment_date, 1, 7) = '2005-06'

question: What is the average replacement cost for the movies with a rental rate of 4.99?
query: SELECT AVG(replacement_cost) FROM film WHERE rental_rate = 4.99

question: What is the average rental rate for PG-13 rated movies?
query: SELECT AVG(rental_rate) FROM film WHERE rating = 'PG-13'

question: Indicate the percentage of inactive customers at store no.1.
query: SELECT CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN active = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS REAL) * 100 / COUNT(customer_id) FROM customer WHERE store_id = 1

question: For how long can you rent the movie 'Dirty Ace'?
query: SELECT rental_duration FROM film WHERE title = 'DIRTY ACE'

question: Identify the full name of the customer, who has the following email address: SHEILA.WELLS@sakilacustomer.org.
query: SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customer WHERE email = 'SHEILA.WELLS@sakilacustomer.org'

question: Provide the list of the longest movies. Arrange these titles in alphabetical order.
query: SELECT title FROM film WHERE length = ( SELECT MAX(length) FROM film )

question: How many film categories are there?
query: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT category_id) FROM category

question: How many titles did Mary Smith rent in 2005? Determine the percentage of titles rented in June 2005.
query: SELECT COUNT(T2.rental_id) , CAST(SUM(IIF(STRFTIME('%m',T2.rental_date) = '7', 1, 0)) AS REAL) * 100 / COUNT(T2.rental_id) FROM customer AS T1 INNER JOIN rental AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id WHERE T1.first_name = 'Maria' AND T1.last_name = 'Miller' AND STRFTIME('%Y',T2.rental_date) = '2005'

question: How many customers are still active?
query: SELECT COUNT(customer_id) FROM customer WHERE active = 1

question: List all the films that are rated as PG-13.
query: SELECT title FROM film WHERE rating = 'PG-13'

question: List at least 10 films that the customers can rent for more than 5 days.
query: SELECT T.title FROM ( SELECT T1.title, COUNT(T3.customer_id) AS num FROM film AS T1 INNER JOIN inventory AS T2 ON T1.film_id = T2.film_id INNER JOIN rental AS T3 ON T2.inventory_id = T3.inventory_id WHERE T1.rental_duration > 5 GROUP BY T1.title ) AS T WHERE T.num > 10

question: List all the cities that belong to United Arab Emirates.
query: SELECT T1.city FROM city AS T1 INNER JOIN country AS T2 ON T2.country_id = T1.country_id WHERE country = 'United Arab Emirates'

question: List at least 5 customers who paid greater than $10. Provide the full name of the customers.
query: SELECT T2.first_name, T2.last_name FROM payment AS T1 INNER JOIN customer AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id WHERE T1.amount > 10

question: What films did Burt Dukakis got star in?
query: SELECT T3.title FROM film_actor AS T1 INNER JOIN actor AS T2 ON T1.actor_id = T2.actor_id INNER JOIN film AS T3 ON T1.film_id = T3.film_id WHERE T2.first_name = 'BURT' AND T2.last_name = 'DUKAKIS'

question: Provide the full name of all the actors of the film "Ending Crowds".
query: SELECT T2.first_name, T2.last_name FROM film_actor AS T1 INNER JOIN actor AS T2 ON T1.actor_id = T2.actor_id INNER JOIN film AS T3 ON T1.film_id = T3.film_id WHERE T3.title = 'ENDING CROWDS'

question: Who are the actors starred in the film "Bound Cheaper"?
query: SELECT T1.first_name, T1.last_name FROM actor AS T1 INNER JOIN film_actor AS T2 ON T1.actor_id = T2.actor_id INNER JOIN film AS T3 ON T2.film_id = T3.film_id WHERE T3.title = 'BOUND CHEAPER'

question: List all the films that Karl Berr starred in and rated as PG.
query: SELECT T3.title FROM actor AS T1 INNER JOIN film_actor AS T2 ON T1.actor_id = T2.actor_id INNER JOIN film AS T3 ON T2.film_id = T3.film_id WHERE T1.first_name = 'KARL' AND T1.last_name = 'BERRY' AND T3.rating = 'PG'

question: List at least 3 cities under the country of Philippines.
query: SELECT T1.city FROM city AS T1 INNER JOIN country AS T2 ON T2.country_id = T1.country_id WHERE country = 'Philippines'

question: What are the films that are least rented by the customers?
query: SELECT T.title FROM ( SELECT T3.title, COUNT(T1.customer_id) AS num FROM rental AS T1 INNER JOIN inventory AS T2 ON T1.inventory_id = T2.inventory_id INNER JOIN film AS T3 ON T2.film_id = T3.film_id GROUP BY T3.title ) AS T ORDER BY T.num DESC LIMIT 1

question: List all the description of the films starring Lucille Tracy?
query: SELECT T1.film_id FROM film_actor AS T1 INNER JOIN actor AS T2 ON T1.actor_id = T2.actor_id WHERE T2.first_name = 'LUCILLE' AND T2.last_name = 'TRACY'

question: Which category is the film "Beach Heartbreakers" falls into?
query: SELECT T3.name FROM film AS T1 INNER JOIN film_category AS T2 ON T1.film_id = T2.film_id INNER JOIN category AS T3 ON T2.category_id = T3.category_id WHERE T1.title = 'BEACH HEARTBREAKERS'

question: List at least 10 films that falls into the Horror category.
query: SELECT T1.title FROM film AS T1 INNER JOIN film_category AS T2 ON T1.film_id = T2.film_id INNER JOIN category AS T3 ON T2.category_id = T3.category_id WHERE T3.name = 'Horror'

question: Who among the actors starred in a NC-17 rated film? Provide only the last name of the actors.
query: SELECT T1.last_name FROM actor AS T1 INNER JOIN film_actor AS T2 ON T1.actor_id = T2.actor_id INNER JOIN film AS T3 ON T2.film_id = T3.film_id WHERE T3.rating = 'NC-17'

question: Calculate the average rate of renting the film that Lucille Tracy got starred.
query: SELECT AVG(T3.rental_rate) FROM actor AS T1 INNER JOIN film_actor AS T2 ON T1.actor_id = T2.actor_id INNER JOIN film AS T3 ON T2.film_id = T3.film_id WHERE T1.first_name = 'LUCILLE' AND T1.last_name = 'TRACY'

question: How many films have a duration between 100 to 110 minutes?
query: SELECT COUNT(film_id) FROM film WHERE length BETWEEN 100 AND 110

question: List down the actor ID of actors with Dee as their last name.
query: SELECT actor_id FROM actor WHERE last_name = 'Dee'

question: Among the active customers, how many of them have Nina as their first name?
query: SELECT COUNT(customer_id) FROM customer WHERE first_name = 'Nina' AND active = 1

question: In store ID 2, how many of the films are R rating?
query: SELECT COUNT(T1.film_id) FROM film AS T1 INNER JOIN inventory AS T2 ON T1.film_id = T2.film_id WHERE T2.store_id = 2 AND T1.rating = 'R'

question: List the store ID of the films starred by Reese West with a duration of 100 minutes and below?
query: SELECT T4.store_id FROM actor AS T1 INNER JOIN film_actor AS T2 ON T1.actor_id = T2.actor_id INNER JOIN film AS T3 ON T2.film_id = T3.film_id INNER JOIN inventory AS T4 ON T3.film_id = T4.film_id WHERE T3.length < 100 AND T1.first_name = 'Reese' AND T1.last_name = 'West'

question: Give the duration of the film starred by Nick Wahlberg with the highest rental rate.
query: SELECT T3.title FROM actor AS T1 INNER JOIN film_actor AS T2 ON T1.actor_id = T2.actor_id INNER JOIN film AS T3 ON T2.film_id = T3.film_id WHERE T1.first_name = 'Nick' AND T1.last_name = 'Wahlberg' ORDER BY T3.rental_rate DESC LIMIT 1

question: What are the titles of the films starred by Russell Close?
query: SELECT T3.title FROM film_actor AS T1 INNER JOIN actor AS T2 ON T1.actor_id = T2.actor_id INNER JOIN film AS T3 ON T1.film_id = T3.film_id WHERE T2.first_name = 'Russell' AND T2.last_name = 'Close'

question: List the store ID of the film titled "Amadeus Holy".
query: SELECT T2.store_id FROM film AS T1 INNER JOIN inventory AS T2 ON T1.film_id = T2.film_id WHERE T1.title = 'Amadeus Holy'

question: In films with a rental rate of 2.99, how many of the films are starred by Nina Soto?
query: SELECT COUNT(T1.film_id) FROM film_actor AS T1 INNER JOIN actor AS T2 ON T1.actor_id = T2.actor_id INNER JOIN film AS T3 ON T1.film_id = T3.film_id WHERE T3.rental_rate = 2.99 AND T2.first_name = 'Nina' AND T2.last_name = 'Soto'

question: Among the films starred by Reese West, what is the difference between the films that have store ID of 1 and store ID of 2?
query: SELECT SUM(IIF(T4.film_id = 1, 1, 0)) - SUM(IIF(T4.film_id = 2, 1, 0)) AS diff FROM film_actor AS T1 INNER JOIN actor AS T2 ON T1.actor_id = T2.actor_id INNER JOIN film AS T3 ON T1.film_id = T3.film_id INNER JOIN inventory AS T4 ON T3.film_id = T4.film_id WHERE T2.first_name = 'Reese' AND T2.last_name = 'West'

question: What is the postal code of the address 692 Joliet Street?
query: SELECT postal_code FROM address WHERE address = '692 Joliet Street'

question: How many customers are active?
query: SELECT COUNT(customer_id) FROM customer WHERE active = 1

question: Among all the customers of store no.1, how many of them are active?
query: SELECT COUNT(customer_id) FROM customer WHERE active = 1 AND store_id = 1

question: What is the address of Mary Smith?
query: SELECT T1.address FROM address AS T1 INNER JOIN customer AS T2 ON T1.address_id = T2.address_id WHERE T2.first_name = 'MARY' AND T2.last_name = 'SMITH'

question: Among all the active customers, how many of them live in Arlington?
query: SELECT COUNT(T2.customer_id) FROM address AS T1 INNER JOIN customer AS T2 ON T1.address_id = T2.address_id INNER JOIN city AS T3 ON T1.city_id = T3.city_id WHERE T2.active = 1 AND T3.city = 'Arlington'

question: Please list the full names of all the customers who live in Italy.
query: SELECT T4.first_name, T4.last_name FROM address AS T1 INNER JOIN city AS T2 ON T1.city_id = T2.city_id INNER JOIN country AS T3 ON T2.country_id = T3.country_id INNER JOIN customer AS T4 ON T1.address_id = T4.address_id WHERE T3.country = 'Italy'

question: Which country does Mary Smith live in?
query: SELECT T3.country FROM address AS T1 INNER JOIN city AS T2 ON T1.city_id = T2.city_id INNER JOIN country AS T3 ON T2.country_id = T3.country_id INNER JOIN customer AS T4 ON T1.address_id = T4.address_id WHERE T4.first_name = 'MARY' AND T4.last_name = 'SMITH'

question: What is the biggest amount of payment for a rental made by Mary Smith?
query: SELECT T1.amount FROM payment AS T1 INNER JOIN customer AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id WHERE T2.first_name = 'MARY' AND T2.last_name = 'SMITH' ORDER BY T1.amount DESC LIMIT 1

question: How many times has Mary Smith rented a film?
query: SELECT COUNT(T1.customer_id) FROM payment AS T1 INNER JOIN customer AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id WHERE T2.first_name = 'MARY' AND T2.last_name = 'SMITH'

question: What is the total amount of money Mary Smith has spent on film rentals?
query: SELECT SUM(T1.amount) FROM payment AS T1 INNER JOIN customer AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id WHERE T2.first_name = 'MARY' AND T2.last_name = 'SMITH'

question: Among the times Mary Smith had rented a movie, how many of them happened in June, 2005?
query: SELECT COUNT(T1.customer_id) FROM payment AS T1 INNER JOIN customer AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id WHERE T2.first_name = 'MARY' AND T2.last_name = 'SMITH' AND STRFTIME('%Y',T1.payment_date) = '2005' AND STRFTIME('%Y', T1.payment_date) = '6'

question: Please give the full name of the customer who had made the biggest amount of payment in one single film rental.
query: SELECT T2.first_name, T2.last_name FROM payment AS T1 INNER JOIN customer AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id ORDER BY T1.amount DESC LIMIT 1

question: How much in total had the customers in Italy spent on film rentals?
query: SELECT SUM(T5.amount) FROM address AS T1 INNER JOIN city AS T2 ON T1.city_id = T2.city_id INNER JOIN country AS T3 ON T2.country_id = T3.country_id INNER JOIN customer AS T4 ON T1.address_id = T4.address_id INNER JOIN payment AS T5 ON T4.customer_id = T5.customer_id WHERE T3.country = 'Italy'

question: Among the payments made by Mary Smith, how many of them are over 4.99?
query: SELECT COUNT(T1.amount) FROM payment AS T1 INNER JOIN customer AS T2 ON T1.customer_id = T2.customer_id WHERE T2.first_name = 'MARY' AND T2.last_name = 'SMITH' AND T1.amount > 4.99

question: What is the average amount of money spent by a customer in Italy on a single film rental?
query: SELECT AVG(T5.amount) FROM address AS T1 INNER JOIN city AS T2 ON T1.city_id = T2.city_id INNER JOIN country AS T3 ON T2.country_id = T3.country_id INNER JOIN customer AS T4 ON T1.address_id = T4.address_id INNER JOIN payment AS T5 ON T4.customer_id = T5.customer_id WHERE T3.country = 'Italy'
